(Okay, technically three, but one of them is that it's version 5.0 of our app, and you know how excited the product managers get when they flip over a new version num

--- Version 5.0.1 ---
All the same goodies from version 5.0, plus a few important stability fixes. Get it while it's hot!

--- Version 5.0 ---

What were we talking about? Right, Saavn 5.1... two big updates in this release: lots of fixes to make your listening experience smoother, an

Hello. It's me.
I was wondering if after all these years you'd like to meet,
to go over everything...
...that's new in Saavn 5.2

This update is (almost) all about audio. Yea, I know what you're thinking... no, not that thing, that's creepy

Hear ye, hear ye. On this day of the month of November, let it be known that doth hast received a cornucopia of software patchwork, replete with... eh, forget it. That bit was gonna get olde. Heh, get it? Olde. Fine, be that way. Onward with the notes!<br

Not much.

Heh, just kidding. (Well, actually I guess that's kinda true, it's a small update. Still there's some new stuff.)

• Editable Accounts
Yes, you read that right... the long international nightmare is over. You can FINALLY change t

Ready? We hope you're sitting down. (Actually, standing is fine too. In fact, stand up. It's an update. They don't call it a downdate.)

• Music Library (YES, FINALLY!!)
Your most requested feature has arrived. Collect all the music you love, wit

5.6 rhymes with 5.fix! So, that's what we did... fixed a whole bunch of funky bugs and quirks. Normally, this is where we'd do some longwinded opining, but honestly I'm busy today and this laundry isn't gonna fold itself, so let's go.

Here's what's

WOW. You've voted us a #1 (cough, star) APP! Truly an incredible honor, beyond humbling. We couldn't be more proud! Of all the stars, you think we're the first one! Let's see... so many people to thank. My acceptance speech is here somewh—

(What? T

- A small number of you fine people weren't able to search after the last update. Ironically, we searched for the issue, and we found it. So you can now search again. Well, technically you could always search, you just wouldn't always get results. Which i

She goes, "Why not?" And I say, "Because honey, you can't eat waffles upside down—" oh, hello there, didn't realize we were live! How are you? Good, me too. A little tired, but what else is new.

Anyway, let's see what we have for you. Lots of littl

Hi guys and gals! :) Quickie this month...

+ Apple Watch Support
Control your Saavn from your Apple Watch... what is this, the future?! Yes, it is. Well it was. Now it's not again. But an existential conversation about the impermanence of time i

DESPACITO!!

Sorry, just wanted to get your attention. On to the updates. :)

+ Buffering, Playback, and Bluetooth Improvements
We sent our brave QA team deep into the bowels of the worst network areas we could find. They traveled by car, r

Nothing.

Heh, that would be funny. No, it's something, we just honestly didn't understand what the engineers told us. Allegedly, they fiddled with some knobs or whatever and made the whole thing work a little better. A lesser communicator might res
Well, this is embarrassing. Seems the wrong build snuck out there and broke some things for you fine folks on iOS 11. That should be all fixed now! Back to the music!

Hello, team. Apropos of the upcoming holiday season, this update is sort of a potpourri edition. A grab-bag, if you will. (Don't worry, it's not one of those weird office party grab-bags where you end up with a mug shaped like a toilet that Janice in acco

+ In 5.14, we've added another "notch" to our belt. An "X" factor, perhaps. A little Thanksgiving bonus to make you feel "full"(screen). iPhone X support has landed! So go, X friends, and enjoy all that full screen, rounded corner, notch-avoiding goodness

Honestly? I ate too much turkey at Thanksgiving, woke up a few days later, and now there's another update. Who knows. Guess we found it in the stuffing or something. Anyway, what's new in this guy, let's see...

A quick set of bug fixes. Or, if you'

Yes, me again. I know, I know.  :)  But it was important. Turns out something went kinda haywire for you fine folks on iOS 11, particularly when using AirPods, Bluetooth, car speakers, or a few other audio scenarios. If you were getting crashes or seeing

Well, we made it. The last update of the year. Unless you're reading this in 2018, in which case, total identity crisis. It would've been more poignant just before New Year's Eve ... but there was champagne, and we all get distracted ... what's that? Oh,

Fix for a crash that may have been effecting some of you. Sorry about that! Should be better now. :) Plus all the goodies and fixes from...

This is one of those annoying releases where we try to make up something that you'll care about, but the truth is we just had to fix some things you'll never notice. It's kinda like bringing your car to the shop for an oil change and tune-up... they claim

Roses are red.
Violets are blue.
Valentine's Day already passed, but let's be honest it's just an arbitrary commoditization of love anyway so what difference does the date make?
And we love you.

Okay, I'll keep working on it.

Welcome back, friends. It's getting warm out there, eh? Unless you're in Siberia or something, it's probably cold there. But then you can use your imagination. Which, I'd assume you have to do a lot in Siberia.

Anyway, what's new...

+ Share

+ Apparently, some of you were still experiencing crashes at launch. So we squashed that bugger once and for all.
+ Also fixed a small, but annoying, issue which might have caused your notifications to disappear form the lock screen.

After months of waiting, Saavn is now JioSaavn! :: party emoji ::


++ For All Jio and JioMusic Users ++

Welcome to your new home! Don't worry, this is easy.

• Is it still free?
Yes, it's still free to use for Jio users!

Some spring cleaning to make your buttery smooth experience butterier and smoother. We fixed a rogue bug that was, for some users, deleting more songs that it should from your playlists while editing. I mean, we all love surprises, but that wasn't what we

Hello, Saavn'ers. It's me again. Time for another meandering note elucidating enigmatic engineering efforts, eagerly espousing exciting ennui-eliminating product updates. Or as we like to call it, EEEEEEEEEP! Updates! (:Party Emoji:)

But before we

After months of waiting, Saavn is now JioSaavn! :: party emoji ::


++ For All Jio and JioMusic Users ++

Welcome to your new home! Don't worry, this is easy.

• Is it still free?
Yes, it's still free to use for Jio users!

+ Some of you fine folks were experiencing issues accessing JioTunes. Don't worry, they're still here! That should all be fixed now. Just make sure you're connected on Jio mobile data.
+ And, we've also brought back JioTunes previews. So, no more worry

+ Fixed an issue that was causing the app to crash at launch for some users. We like crashing a party as much as they next fella, but clearly that was getting annoying. Our apologies – all fixed now ... back to the music!

++ Plus all the great stuf

+ Apparently, some of you were still experiencing crashes at launch. So we squashed that bugger once and for all.
+ Also fixed a small, but annoying, issue which might have caused your notifications to disappear form the lock screen.
+ Some other mi

I know, I know. We promised cool stuff in the next release, and that's this one, but there's no new cool stuff... YET. Just another batch of quick fixes to keep things humming along for you. We'll be right back with the cool stuff.

Oh boy. We hope you're sitting down! But not for too long... too much sitting is no good. Get up and stretch those legs. And then sit back down, cause we have news.

Ho Ho Hope everyone is in the holiday spirit, 'cause we come bearing gifts!

This is (probably) the last update of the decade. (I mean, technically it's not the decade. That would be next year. We didn't start in year zero, we started in year one! B

So, this update is largely for our Jio family. Because what are we, if not family? I mean, we're people too. And I guess some of us are coin collectors. But hey, family first right?? Anyway, a couple of goodies to keep you fine Jio folks happy, as well as

Hello, music family. These are serious and anxious times, so first and foremost we hope everyone is feeling well and taking all the necessary precautions you can to stay healthy and safe. We'll do our best to keep you company, and keep the music playing.<

Hi guys. Hello? Am I audible? Oh, ye— yes, I can see you now. Is everyone on? Okay, good.

First, we hope everyone is feeling well and staying safe! Stay home, wash your hands, and be kind to people!

Now... on the fun stuff!

It's here, our holiday love note to you... come get your JioSaavn Replay and relive your musical 2020! (We promise, music stuff only... nobody wants to relive anything else about this dang year.)

That's it. No other deets or doodads. Just have fun
